summary: This ties my Whiterun, Solitude and Windhelm Mods together into one Mod.
descriptionHtml:
This ties my Whiterun, Solitude and Windhelm Mods together into one Mod. It cleans up the stuff that was left permanently damaged by the civil war. Includes [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17981]Whiterun v1.4 [/url], [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18158]Solitude v1.2[/url] and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18234]Windhelm v1.1[/url].

Change log:
v1.2 - Finished fixing smoke issues.
v1.1 - Fixed a gap in the ground in Solitude and some smoke issues in Whiterun.
v1.0 - Initial Release.



[color=yellow]Check Out My Other Mods[/color]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15567]Stop The Dark Brotherhood Forever Quest From Returning[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15693]Breezehome Extra Light[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17981]Whiterun Repaired Plus[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18158]Solitude Repaired[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18234]Windhelm Repaired[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18280]No Warning[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16663]Muffle Your Horse[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17285]Muffle Your Dog[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17309]Muffle The Bards[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17641]Muffle The Nirnroot[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17695]Muffle Heimskr - The Preacher in Whiterun[/url]


[size=5][color=red]- Have Fun -[/color][/size]
author: MightyMalts

files.name: Civil War Repairs - v1_1
files.changelogHtml: Fixed a gap in the ground in Solitude and some smoke issues in Whiterun.
